import {React, useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './Nav.css' import iconMenu from '../images/icon-menu.svg'; import logo from '../images/icon-dept.svg'; export default function Navbar(props){ let [counter, setCounter] = useState(0); if(counter>2){ setCounter(1); } useEffect(() => { toggleMenu(); },[counter]); const toggleMenu = () => { console.log(counter); let hamburger = document.getElementById('nav-container-open'); if(counter === 1){ hamburger.classList.remove('.nav-container-close'); } else if (counter === 2){ hamburger.classList.add('.nav-container-open'); hamburger.classList.remove('.nav-container-close'); } } return(
setCounter(counter + 1)}>
